channel.title: RuneScape's Report System?
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i243.photobucket.com/albums/ff130/george_0107/rs2.jpg[/img]
What's up with it or is it just me?
I've been at hill giants for about a week now, 30 minutes a day or so. I get people calling me names, i don't really care, i just report them so maybe one day they will unmute me lol. So in the span of a week, i reported more than a dozen players, still no response from them? Usually when i report someone and the evidence is overwhelming OR right there in their face, like the case above, they respond like in 2 days or so.
I've been sending them messages through the message centre. They said if i keep sending them messages, they will block my messages? I stopped sending them messages after that.
Is it possible they blocked me? But abuse reports are different aren't they?
Perform an experiment if you don't mind. Go to F2P, some world anyone you want(F2P). And go to the hill giants and that range corner, start taking all the giants, like i do, take 2 at the same time. They will get mad and curse at you, report them, and tell me if the following days if they actually tell you(JaGex), "we have taken action against this person, blah blah blah."
Btw F2P people are so immature. No offense, but most of them are.

item.title: RuneScape's Report System?
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

[quote=“Casey., post:4, topic:146395”][quote author=Java Is My Bitch link=topic=200424.msg1780725#msg1780725 date=1190773732]

People who report others are fags

If I was a Jagex mod, I’d do it to you, simply because there is a “Report abuse” button, for that reason.

LMAO. But imo screw everyone else, its your own personal gain.
[/quote]
Whats to gain?
A shitty crown?[/quote]

UNMUTENESS.

Screw the crown.

Do you know how hard it is to buy a single item without talking? You have to wait for a person to say selling so and so item. it gets really really annoying! I don’t look for the crown, just being able to talk again would be enough.

Read full topic
